thread.title: Video of Olympic Record Holders Goes Viral, Including Arshad Nadeem
thread.title_full: Video of Olympic Record Holders Goes Viral, Including Arshad Nadeem

author: archyworldyscom
title: Video of Olympic Record Holders Goes Viral, Including Arshad Nadeem
text:
Web Desk: The video of the record holders of the Paris Olympics, including Pakistani gold medalist Arshad Nadeem, has gone viral.
The International Olympic Committee has released the video of the key moments of the different sports of the Paris 2024 Olympics.
Among the successful athletes in the video is Pakistani gold medalist Arshad Nadeem, who set a record in the javelin throw event. While other moments are shown in this video, the action of Arshad Nadeem’s spectacular throw is also shown.
It is worth mentioning that Arshad Nadeem won the Olympic gold medal for Pakistan after 40 years by winning the final of the javelin throw event.
During the competition, the Pakistani athlete also set a new Olympic record by throwing 92.97 meters.
It is worth mentioning that the video of Olympic record holders, including Pakistani gold medalist Arshad Nadeem, has gone viral.
During the 2024 Olympic Games, the famous Pakistani athlete won the gold medal with his best performance and also set a record by throwing the javelin the longest distance in the 118-year history of the Olympics. No one had ever thrown a spear for such a long distance before.
#Video #Olympic #Record #Holders #Viral #Including #Arshad #Nadeem
– 2024-09-05 19:42:06
